value.label: Ensure VAT number and rate correct

value.label: Please align SFDC S&H to Docusign. Email Order Ops

value.label: Please send a new DocuSign to the customer with a Billing Company Name that matches the CPQ quote

value.fullName: If the change to the Total Hardware Due or Total License Due is intentional, have the Customer sign a new Order Form for the updated values. If this was an unintentional change, revert the opportunity to the original values and resubmit to Closing.
value.label: If the change to the Total Hardware Due or Total License Due is intentional, have the Customer sign a new Order Form for the updated values. If this was an unintentional change, revert the opportunity to the original values and resubmit to Closing.

value.label: Please supply a new PO with FOB Destination removed or attach a signed Order Form

value.label: Attach Missing documentation to oppty level

value.label: Need to confirm if customer is going through Samsara directly or is this a partner/reseller deal

value.label: Update the selected payment type to upfront, then generate a new OF

value.label: Generate a new OF with the correct shipping costs included in the first payment

value.label: Obtain DD approval for the new terms and update the account level accordingly

value.label: Update the order form to include the buyout language and amount

value.label: Have DD update the finance notes in the opportunity level to reflect approval for the custom deal

value.label: Generate the correct order form template

value.label: Align the license term with the order form

value.label: Obtain ISD approvals at the CPQ level

value.label: Update the promo to reflect a 100% discount

value.label: Update the renewed contract field to include the Contract ID

value.label: Provide a reason for the discount on the promo

value.label: Ensure multiline shipping is checked on CPQ

value.fullName: Ensure the license value matches the order form
value.label: Ensure the license value matches the order form

value.fullName: Align CPQ payment terms with the app level
value.label: Align CPQ payment terms with the app level

value.fullName: Align Total License cost in SFDC with Order Form
value.label: Align Total License cost in SFDC with Order Form

value.fullName: If the change to the Number of Free Months is intentional, the Customer must sign a new Order Form with the updated values. If this was an unintentional change, revert CPQ to the original values and resubmit to Closing
value.label: If the change to the Number of Free Months is intentional, the Customer must sign a new Order Form with the updated values. If this was an unintentional change, revert CPQ to the original values and resubmit to Closing

value.fullName: If the change to the Free Service Amount is intentional, the Customer must sign a new Order Form with the updated amounts. If this was an unintentional change, revert CPQ to the original values and resubmit to Closing
value.label: If the change to the Free Service Amount is intentional, the Customer must sign a new Order Form with the updated amounts. If this was an unintentional change, revert CPQ to the original values and resubmit to Closing

value.fullName: If the change to the Free Service Amount tax is due to a change in the Free Service Amount, the Customer must sign a new Order Form with the updated amounts. If this change is unintentional, please check with the Tax team
value.label: If the change to the Free Service Amount tax is due to a change in the Free Service Amount, the Customer must sign a new Order Form with the updated amounts. If this change is unintentional, please check with the Tax team
